title: <light-pen>
content:
Typical Usage


  
    
      
        
          This is kind of wild huh? We have a <light-pen>
          component running inside of a <light-pen> component!!
        
      

      
        code {
          padding: 2px 6px;
          display: inline-block;
          font-size: 0.9em;
          background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
          border-radius: 4px;
        }
      
    
  

  
    html, body {
      height: 100%;
      min-height: 100%;
      width: 100%;
      margin: 0;
    }

    light-pen {
      height: 100%;
    }
  

  
    import LightPen from "/light-pen/bridgetown/static/light-pen/exports/light-pen.NTI5VAFZ.js";
    LightPen.define()
